name: Succubus Contract
detailed_description:
Succubus Contract is dating-sim puzzle game with many beautiful women!

Arriving in a new city you wanted to start a new life. This is a good city and there are a lot of beautiful girls!
Unfortunately, for some reason you didn't get along with the girls.

One evening you found a strange application in your phone. After trying to start the application, nothing seemed to happen ...
But suddenly you realized that something incredible had actually happened! A succubus appeared in your room and offered to make a contract with her.
Looks like fun adventures waiting!

During a meeting with girls you can talk to them or give a gift and receive special energy.
This energy can be spent on improving your passive and active abilities, which will help you on dates.
During dates, you'll receive money, which you can buy gifts, food and drinks.
Performing tasks for each girl, you will improve your relationship and fill their hearts with your love!

short_description: Succubus Contract is dating-sim puzzle game with many beautiful women!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 10
  • Processor: Core 2 duo
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 8800 GT
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX: 9.0c compabile

content_descriptors.notes:
When you reach a new level in relationships with girls, you'll receive a reward. This reward can be a message with a photo that the girl will send you and share her thoughts with you, or maybe she will decide to do something more for you.

Important: The contract with the succubus provides you only a app for the phone, which shows information about the girls that suit you. all sexual content in game is consensual, there is no any violence, cruelty, mind control or magic seduction.
